questions_and_notes: I would think that deposition would be restricted to a transfer to the surface from the air immediately above it.  If so, why not define standard names of the form "surface_mass_flux_of_<species>_due_to_depostion", which I think would be easier to interpret by most users?
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 1 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
long_name: Sedimentation Flux of Dust Mode Coarse Insoluble
comment: Dry mass deposition rate of dust aerosol.
